entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
